titles.title: To redesignate certain clinics of the Department of Veterans Affairs located in Montana.
To redesignate certain clinics of the Department of Veterans Affairs located in Montana.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
This bill redesignates Department of Veterans Affairs clinics in Montana at the following locations:
2687 Palmer Street in Missoula as the "David J. Thatcher Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic," 1775 Spring Creek Lane in Billings as the "Dr. Joseph Medicine Crow Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic," and 1766 Majestic Lane in Billings as the "Benjamin Charles Steele Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic." Any local public display of the name of the Dr. Joseph Medicine Crow Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic carried out by the United States or through the use of federal funds shall include both the English name, Dr. Joseph Medicine Crow, and the Crow name, Dakaak Baako.
